posts.post_content:
Looking for raw or graded GD-VGEX Pirates and Cubs w/decent eye appeal for my personal collection...no major paper loss or trimmed cards please.  Looking to pay $15-$25/ea. give or take a couple bucks. Please send me a pm or email [url]patricknoll@hotmail.com[/url] with $'s and scans. I will get back to you in a couple days as I will be away today and tomorrow. Thanks! 

T205 Cubs need them all EXCEPT: Pfeister, Reulbach, Ritchie, Tinker/Evers/Chance. 

T206 Pirates need them all EXCEPT: Maddox Throwing, Camnitz Arms at Side, Leifield Pitching. (Also, I need a T205 Phillipe)
